data.actual_result: Blocked messages are revealed above the "X blocked messages" button while on Desktop they expand below
data.expected_result: Messages should expand in a consistent direction across clients
data.short_description: Blocked messages expand in the opposite direction compared to Desktop
data.steps_to_repro: - Block someone that has sent messages in any channel - On Desktop, click the button to reveal blocked messages. Notice the message will appear below the reveal button - Now do the same thing on Android. Notice how the message expands above the button
